channel.title: skincare on Is Beauty
channel.description: Recent content in skincare on Is Beauty

item.title: Mary Kay Lumivie Essence Water
item.description: Description LumiVie™ Skin Care with the power of black pearl Helps deliver multifunctional benefits: Brightening Energizing Moisturization* Even skin tone Excludes LumiVie™ Foaming Cleanser which was not tested for moisturizing properties. The power of black pearl is infused into every LumiVie™ product to deliver an elevated brightening of the skin experience. From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately improved skin brightness. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty.

item.title: Mary Kay Lumivie Foaming Cleanser
item.description: Description From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately bright skin. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty. Helps deliver multifunctional benefits: Brightening Energizing Moisturization* Even skin tone Excludes LumiVie™ Foaming Cleanser which was not tested for moisturizing properties. Overview Why You’ll Love It Black pearl is shown to impact processes1 that protect and brighten skin, and it also helps boost skin energy1 to awaken skin vitality.

item.title: Mary Kay Lumivie Intensive Serum
item.description: Description From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately bright skin. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty. Helps deliver multifunctional benefits: Brightening Energizing Moisturization Overview Black pearl extract is shown to impact processes* that protect and brighten skin, and it also helps boost skin energy*. The exclusive Opti-Bright Complex™ targets multiple sources of uneven skin tone. A special extract of the coastal plant samphire is shown to increase water channels in skin*.

From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately improved skin brightness. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty.
